metadata.synopsis: Minsc ADs to seeing a second Jaheira and expresses confusion and rage.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_Actrl-shift-7Recruit Jaheiractrl-shift-7-> Minsc-> Abandoned CIstern-> Go to Roah BribeFight the fight

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: Jaheira! You have an evil, much uglier twin sister? Minsc does not like this!
0.context: NodeContext: Minsc's only moment of confusion in the combat - he sees the real Jaheria, and turns to the doppelganger Jaheira in confusion.
